content.question: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically. Analyze how the actions taken by BOTH American Indians and European colonists shaped those relationships in TWO of the following regions. Confine your answer to the 1600s. New England Chesapeake Spanish Southwest New York and New France Early encounters between American Indians and European colonists led to a variety of relationships among the different cultures.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
